column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque is soooo SCRUMTIOUS!! A friend at work told me about it and we went there to try it and it was amazing.  The pulled pork with a side of mac and cheese was delicious.  And I have never liked coleslaw until now
column2: and only from Smoque!  No mayo in it!   Tried the beef brisket sandwich too
column3: also delicious.  One of the best Chicago BBQ places I've ever had.
